title: Add JobPosting structured data schema

requirements.text: Add JobPosting JSON-LD structured data markup (schema.org/JobPosting) to the Careers page so search engines can index job postings. Inject the <script type='application/ld+json'> block into the CareersPage component. Do not modify any other component, page, backend logic, or styling.

quotes: add JobPosting schema and change nothing else

acceptanceCriteria: A <script type='application/ld+json'> tag containing a valid schema.org/JobPosting object is rendered in the CareersPage component.
No other files are modified — backend, other pages, components, hooks, and styles remain unchanged.
The structured data validates against schema.org/JobPosting requirements (hiringOrganization, title, datePosted, jobLocation or applicantLocationRequirements).

constraints: Only modify frontend/src/pages/CareersPage.tsx — no other files.
Do not alter any backend logic, data models, or other frontend components.
nonGoals: Adding actual job listings or dynamic job data from the backend.
Modifying the privacy policy content or contact information.
Changing any UI styling or layout.
